resources: "1" "2" "3"> "Create an .xlsx spreadsheet file on Excel or mac Numbers" "The exam will consist of a name (first row), description (second row), image (third row) and a set of questions where each row will correspond with a question" "The first column of each question row will be the question itself, the second one the right answer and all other columns the remaining wrong answers" "Question" "Right response" "Wrong alternative" "Delete" "Do you want to delete this exam?" "Yes, do it" "No" "Unknown" "Type to find an exam" "%s questions" "Check this out!"
